website_summaries.verdict: This efficient clock is a great and cost-effective choice for those wanting two memory loss clocks to place in different areas.
pros: Sleek, stylish design with a number of different color options
The packaging purposely excludes words like dementia and Alzheimer's to make for an excellent senior gift
cons: Color is not always similar to what is pictured online
Does not automatically switch to  daylight saving time

customer_reviews.title: Accurate time is problematic
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful concept, but..... From 15 feet away can't read date if you need glasses But more importantly this clock didn't keep time. The longer I let them run without resetting, the more the time became incorrect. After 2 weeks of not resetting, I have one running 15 minutes fast and the other 10 minutes slow. As the whole idea of a clock is to tell accurate time, these are useless. May have been a bad lot, but I'm reluctant to reorder Sending them back
customer_reviews.author: Sue G. Rosenblum

customer_reviews.title: Love day clocks now
customer_reviews.text: I really like having the day/date/time/am-pm displayed. I bought the 2-pack and regularly use both of them for checking the date/day etc. They do not auto-adjust for time changes so that is manual. They also gain/lose about 1 minute per month so every time I change them for season time changes I also make the adjustment on the time. Easy to read day or night. I had a friend comment on how much he liked as well. I paid a hundred bucks for these two - seems a bit overpriced for the materials involved but I still like them. I like the looks of the walnut colors even though they are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Constant

customer_reviews.title: like receiving two signals from two sources and unable to ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a second note about the product; an unknown reason the clock was receiving a signal that was ...scattered across the screen... ...like receiving two signals from two sources and unable to process... my apologies for not explaining this way...I am not tech wordy... .....what I did was disconnect the clock, move it to new location and no longer receiving mixed signals..no repeat of what happen before. I can not explained it better than this; it works fine. ....maybe, location before was to much signal in that area: I isolated and zero troubles.....which is good. Future reference for another person...too much tech in one space may have cause the problems....overlapping signals....????... the clock works I will keep....
customer_reviews.author: D. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: L@@k --> This Clock is a Cruel Joke for People with Dementia! :-(
customer_reviews.text: It is cruel to sale a clock that cannot keep time! I purchased this clock in July 2018. It does not claim to be an accurate precision time piece, nor is it time updated atomically. With that said, it first started losing a minute or so a couple of months. My microwave keeps better time. Over time, it gradually got worst. A year later, it is loosing 10-minutes a month. My 88-year old mother, for whom I purchased the clock, gets confused as to which clock to follow. Continuity and stability is very important for elderly. Shame on American Lifetime® for producing such a product marketed for the elderly, specifically those with dementia! SHAME!
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clock/calendar for dementia sufferers
customer_reviews.text: My dad has Alzheimer’s and he absolutely loves this clock. He says now he always knows what day/month it is and what time of the day it is. Because when he takes a nap and wakes up, he’s confused as to whether or not it is a new day or the same day. We were also having a hard time having him remember to take his pills but setting the timers on the clock which flash the words take your morning pills help him. We love these clocks so much we bought two more for other rooms .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock!
customer_reviews.text: The product photo on Amazon tells almost everything you need to know about this clock. I love being able to see the display from across the room. We saw this clock first at the home of a visually impaired friend who was bedridden. I came home and immediately searched on Amazon and ordered one. The clock display turns off when disconnected from external power but the internal rechargeable battery retains the memory and settings until power is restored. The only thing that the display lacks is the room temperature. I subsequently ordered three more clocks as gifts for family and friends. The only minor negative I have is that delivery took a day or two longer than predicted.
customer_reviews.author: Al Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution to Eliminate Day/Date/Time Confusion
customer_reviews.text: For those struggling with constantly asking the day or date or time, this is perfect. Big, bright display. It made a huge difference and now there is one hanging over the 7 day pill box to eliminate what day it is, and whether they have taken their medication. Because it is a pill box with AM dosages and PM dosages, the display also indicates if it is morning or evening. Thank you so much as this has been a huge help!! Well done!! It comes nicely packaged and is so super easy to set up. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: My mother is in the early stages of Alzheimer Disease and was having trouble with her calendar and also remembering if she had taken her pills. Since giving her this clock on her birthday she hasn't had any issues! Worth every penny. She didn't seem thrilled with it and didn't really comment on it at first but after a couple of days she mentioned it had been a big help. Gives me piece of mind and it's worth it to purchase for that alone. Wish I had taken advantage of this offer for 2. ONLY thing I've encountered was it didn't reset for Daylight Savings but it might have been something I overlooked.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clock for senior with memory decline
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock for a senior relative with some memory decline. It works wonderfully. My relative used to ask a lot "What time is it?" or "What day is it?" Now, when that happens, I simply reply with "What does your clock say?" My relative can easily read the clock from across the room and he understands quickly what time, date, day of the week, and time of day it is (e.g., morning, evening). This is an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clock with day and date.  Cannot dim, no music feature.
customer_reviews.text: It is helping us all keep track of day of the week and date, and the letters are very large so it can be seen from a distance. I got this for my husband but my son and I are also liking to consult it. I subtracted one star because it cannot be dimmed, and it has no radio music features. I would like to put a second in our bedroom and would highly recommend the company to consider a dim feature for this purpose. Nice to add a radio, but I am just wishing here. Good for what it is designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Light Dimming feature did not work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has a hard time seeing without his glasses. The numbers are large and easy to read. I set everything up easily. Unfortunately the dim feature did not work at all. The clock is VERY bright. Nice during the day—horrible at night. He had to turn the clock over in order to sleep. That isn’t what the clock is for! I ordered 2 of these, so will be sending both back.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: It is as advertised. Came very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Nice large numbers and letters. I like that when you wake up in the middle of the night and look at the clock you know exactly what day and what time of days it is. I don't care for the white or yellow color choices. I also thought there was 5 different alarm settings. Yes you can set 5 different times, but they all have to follow the same rule. Like is it weekends or weekdays. You cannot set it for say 0600 on week days and 0700 on weekends. Which is actually what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Momma1965

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Dementia
customer_reviews.text: My mother, who is in the mid stages of Alzheimer's, loves these clocks. We had a very ugly LCD clock that looks likely scoreboard that she relied on. When I brought these to her, she was delighted because they look like normal decor. I was afraid she would find the "morning, afternoon, evening" info condescending, but I think it's one of her favorite features. (It just goes to show how well people hide their issues.) While I was surprised that these were rather cheap-feeling plastic, they look just fine. It's one of the best purchases I've made to help her feel independent.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoLass

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT keep right time
customer_reviews.text: If you want to reset the time every month, this is the clock for you. It gains a minute every month so after 5 months, it is 5 minutes fast and hard to reset back. I never used the alarm feature so I can’t comment on that but am sure that it would be difficult too with the buttons on the back (to set and stop alarm). I now have it only on the feature of time of day - morning, afternoon, evening - such as “Now It’s Saturday Morning”. I will need to find another clock with all the features but keeps the right time which is the reason for a clock, right?
customer_reviews.author: kq

customer_reviews.title: Great display
customer_reviews.text: The display on this clock is great. I got the two pack, one for my elderly mother and one for my disabled sister. Both of them appreciate being able to keep tuned into the day and time with this clock. Be aware that it is a corded clock, not battery operated. I do wish it was battery operated for more flexibility in placement. Also it does not change automatically between standard and daylight savings time. Aside from those two issues, the clock is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Catches Attention!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these last week, placed one on the kitchen counter, viewable from the kitchen and TV/family room. The other went on the counter in the hall bath, visible to anyone walking down the hall, or in the bathroom. So far, the awareness of day, date, time has increased. Whether they will become "just part of the furnishings" is yet to be determined, but with the reminder for the hours, they are a little more "obvious" than the regular clocks we have around. Haven't tried the medication alarms yet. Thank you, American Lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Dunford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clock for anyone that has dementia !!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about this clock, it is a perfect clock for my mother with Dementia !! Really is a life changer for her. Helps her with knowing what day it is without asking someone 20 times a day :-) It is very easy to adjust all settings and the alarms that it has. I bought two for moms house, now the wife wants one for our house also.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep time well
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has the day of the week, date and time of day. I just wish it kept time better. After setting the display, it starts gaining time. I bought a 2-pack of the clocks and both are doing the same thing. I wonder if anyone else is having this issue? I re-set mine about 2 week ago and the time is already 3 minutes fast. My mom has the other one and because of COVID restrictions, I am not able to visit her assisted living to adjust the clock for her. So hers is about 15 minutes fast now. Also, I hear that it doesn't adjust automatically for Daylight Savings Time. That will be another hurdle.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Carter

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these clocks. I ordered the double set in black for myself. I no longer have to reach for my cell phone to see what time it is or what the date is! This would have been perfect for my parents before they passed away. They were 75 and 78 years old. My father had early dementia. The multiple settings are great, day, date, morning, evening, afternoon and dawn of the day of the week, dimmer so you can sleep with it in the bedroom, full date and the letters and numbers are large so they can be read without glasses on!
customer_reviews.author: mzfoxworth

customer_reviews.title: Good, just Can’t customize.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just like the pictures! I was a little disappointed at the ‘Alarm’ feature. It lets you set the alarm with a message which is great, BUT they are all pre-set messages: ‘take your morning Medication’ take your evening medication’ etc, I was hope you could insert a small message like ‘time to Wake up’ or ‘time to go to bed’ or whatever is needs for your loved one, which would seem like a pretty easy function to have added.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gil

customer_reviews.title: A big hit with recipients
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these before Christmas with the intention of keeping one for ourselves but ended up giving them all away. Everybody we gave them to has been extremely pleased with them. And I also ordered two more (recently received) so we could have one for ourselves. Bought two because it is a little better deal moneywise (although I think it's a bargain at the price) and because I have someone else in mind to give the other one too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Yeakel

customer_reviews.title: Informative & large
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 of these. Need something since my 82 year old mother-in-law now lives with us full time. She was always asking what time it is, what day is it and what's the date. This seems to have taken care of those questions. It's large enough to see across a large room and fits in nicely with our home.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barnette

customer_reviews.title: cheap china made
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were made in the USA, made in CHINA ,, the clock works great but made very cheap..... 50.00 dollars for one don't buy. the pictures look like they are made out of wood, granite,,,,, haha on me just plain plastic...
customer_reviews.author: scamp gray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, easy to set, easy to hang.  How helpful!  Love it
customer_reviews.text: Del was so fast I was very surprised when this was laid at my front door. The del driver took a pic and it showed up in my email within minutes. What great service all the way around. I am having so much trouble keeping with the days and time while isolating, I think this well help me keep up with dr appts, alarms, etc. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how we did without them
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2...one for living room and the other for her bedroom. They work great! Nice and bright. Big letters and numbers . Gives the day of week, evening or morning, the time and the date. Everyone who sees it loves them. You can read it from across the room. So glad I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Deferr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clocks!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 2 daughters who are always asking what time it is and what day it is...I didn’t want them having their cell phones overnight so these clocks were perfect because they have the multiple alarm settings same as their phones! I’m thinking of getting one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock! I ordered two more
customer_reviews.text: Very good clock. I bought them as gifts. We liked them so much that I bought two more for myself! The only thing I don't like is not having an option to dim the brightness. If it is there - I Don't see how to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in FL

customer_reviews.title: Great digital display components, but way WAY overpriced for a plastic clock!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom who has vascular dementia. It has been great for her, and my dad also loves it! PRO: Great large digital display! I love all the components - day of the week spelled out, time of day (morning, afternoon, etc.), date spelled out. CON: Extremely overpriced! I honestly thought I was buying wood clocks for this price. I paid $95 for 2 clocks encased in plastic. I was actually extremely shocked when I opened the package. I felt that I had been duped! Who pays $42.50 for a plastic clock?!!!! ....much less.... $95 for TWO plastic clocks?!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What’s today’s date?
customer_reviews.text: The clock is great and would have been perfect.the clock is big so you can see it I was disappointed you can hardly see the date.you should have made the day of the week smaller for you would be able to read it. But the date on the bottom is to small to read. But other than that would have been great and if you would change that for future buyers. I am sure they would be happy
customer_reviews.author: Lori pugliese

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: My mom has dementia and this has been a blessing. I now own 4! One at my sisters where my mom lives, one in front of the tv for when she stays with me. Since I work in another state, I leave one in the room I rent and it is so nice when I wake up not having to search for my glasses but just glance and see what time it is. This is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock for the Elderly
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate in purchasing this clock. My father cannot thank me enough. At times he forgets what day it is and if it is morning or afternoon. He would constantly be asking my mother and would search for the newspaper to verify the date and day. He said the clocks (purchased the 2 pack) have been a Godsend! Helpful item for those who have troubling remembering at times.
customer_reviews.author: Beebs 'Tinez 😊

customer_reviews.title: What a cool product!
customer_reviews.text: My mother would call me frantic in the morning not remembering what day it was. Early signs of dementia has left our family frazzled and confused on what may be age versus the disease and WHAT's NEXT?!? This clock (I got two!) helps calm her anxiety and has helped her (and us) tremendously. Large font can be seen from across the room and reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to read time & date and can do AM/PM or 24 hour time.
customer_reviews.text: Shows you the time AM or PM as well as 24 hours and day of the week, month, year as well as day of month in a clear easy to read format with battery backup. Is the perfect clock, you will know the time, day of the week and day of the month at a glance without deciphering cryptic abbreviations. Just easy to read easy to understand no thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: bgraff

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for an elderly person in their 90s with dementia. This helps her so much to see what the day is, time it and it's clear to read. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Little Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: These clocks were the ticket for helping with time of day confusion!
customer_reviews.text: We got these clocks for mom who is having trouble distinguishing Day or night time when she wakes up or after a nap....would often confuse the morning for evening and vice verse. Super helpful to her. You plug them in and they automatically set the time. Could not be easier. She loves her clocks, one is in the bedroom and one in her kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item —Especially for Retirees!
customer_reviews.text: These came well packaged but are a gift so I haven’t tried these actual items; however, I have previously purchased this same exact product for my elderly father who lives alone and it is great! Easy to read; all pertinent information. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: ted2401

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have for seniors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom who has early dementia and just could not remember what day it was. The big bold type on this digital day clock is perfect. She now knows the day of the week, date and time, morning and night. I purchased the double set so she has one in her kitchen and one in her living room. Easier to set up than described. I only had to plug it in and the date and time set automatically. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Read Clock with Day, Date, and AM PM Readout
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 clocks as a birthday gift for my 96 year old mother. She loves the clocks. We put one in her den and one in her befroom. They have a very nice appearance and they are easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kain

customer_reviews.title: Got to me quickly and safely
customer_reviews.text: This clock is special for memory impaired folks!! Fits in nicely in my living room and bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the one that you get 2 clocks for myself. I was so disappointed when I opened the first one it was cracked. I thought well I have another one and it was cracked. So I had to go through the return process. I also thought the quality wasn’t as it appeared on the site for that amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Elderly
customer_reviews.text: The clocks are Great for the Elderly. I especially like the Time of Day feature; MORNING, AFTERNOON, EVENING, NIGHT, DUSK, ETC...We have purchased 3 for my FiL & have them strategically placed throughout his home.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This clock works perfectly for my wife's mother. She tends to sleep at odd hours and would often be confused about it being morning or evening. This clock eliminates any confusion about time of day, day of the week, and the date. The display is large and easy to read - bright during the day and automatically dims at night. I was impressed enough to purchase one for my own mother and one for my home. The only caveat is that it doesn't have an option to automatically switch between Standard Time and Daylight Savings Time. Other than that small inconvenience, it's a great option for the elderly or others with memory issues.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful clock!
customer_reviews.text: We got these at the nursing facility where I work. Everyone asks where we got them! I then bought a 2 pack for myself and one for my elderly uncle. Easy to read and keep days straight. Wish it were an atomic clock, but it's ok, and if it comes unplugged, it remembers the information.
customer_reviews.author: Horsey 22

customer_reviews.title: Digital EZ Reading Clock
customer_reviews.text: This is a great clock. I honestly didnt know that it existed until I went to my mother's house. It doubles as a night light and also dims , chimes and has alarms with battery backup.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM LACEY

customer_reviews.title: Clock gains time
customer_reviews.text: I have read the instructions and set the clock per the instructions. The clock gained three minutes over a months time. Good conversation item because it looks like a still picture.
customer_reviews.author: John Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 92 yr old mother
customer_reviews.text: My mother is 92 and this clock is perfect for her. She often gets confused as to the day of the week, but this clock solves that problem with large, easy to read letters and numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The BEST CLOCK FOR SENIORS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased TWO clocks for my parents, one who has dementia, one who is nearly blind. (90 and 84 years old) Whenever I visit my parents they both ask me what day it is and often what time it is. A friend showed me this clock she had purchased for her mother who had suffered several strokes and would forget to take her medications and would also often ask what day it was. My parents love this clock! It is clear and bright for my father to see and my mother can see what day it is whenever she wants!
customer_reviews.author: SgtLrm

customer_reviews.title: Yep big letters
customer_reviews.text: Big letters and good display. Very light weight. My mother who has dementia in seesaw first thing in the morning but still asks what day and year it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: This device does what it says....displays the date and time in easy to read large font, and dims itself at 7 PM. One of the two units I received seems to have a bit of a defect in that the background screen is all green instead of black, but everything is still readable. Now...if you are trying to care for someone who will unplug the unit every night and can't remember that they need to leave it plugged in to be effective, it won't do what it is designed to do, but that is no fault of the product.
customer_reviews.author: ROHWarr

customer_reviews.title: Like the clock, not the Cord
customer_reviews.text: I like the clocks but don’t like the electric cords, wish they were battery powered so I could hand them on the wall, who wants an electrical cord running to an outlet nowadays ??
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and looks nice too!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the wood grain clock for my mother who has moderate dementia. It is so helpful for her to be able to see the time, in addition to what part of the day it is. She does occasionally look at the date but that is smaller and at the bottom of the screen. The clock itself works great and looks very nice. It does not reset itself for daylight savings time so you have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: C. Freiwald

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set and now I know day
customer_reviews.text: they are outstanding. Easy to set and now I know day, time and year. At my age it getting hard yo keep up with that. The only thing that I don't understand around 9 or ten at night the day will change to the next date. I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Herschel Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Good product but don't order Mahogany
customer_reviews.text: The pictures on the site look like the Mahogany is a full surround, it's not. It a cheap sticker and the white sides against the Mahogany stand out like a sore thumb. Order white or black unless you only view this straight on and not at angle. Never plugged it in to test the features we wanted which was the multiple alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps elderly parents maintain orientation to day, date, time.
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock! It’s great. I got it for my 87 year old dad with Alzheimer’s and my 86 year old mom who is a long retired high school principal. They both love it. It really helps them both maintain orientation to day, date, time etc. I can see it gives them a good sense of reassurance when they forget what day it is. It also helps them maintain their routine and plan for the day. I ended up buying 3.
customer_reviews.author: Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Lifetime clocks
customer_reviews.text: I Love this lifetime clocks. I ordered one for my 91 yr old neighbor and she loved it and she said her niece now wants one. And I got one for my 77 yr old mother and she can’t say enough about it. So then my sister wanted one so I now have one set aside for her birthday and last but not least I got one for myself!! And to me it reminds me of having a calendar hanging on a wall but more modern. Love love love it. Thank you lifetime for such a great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good clock. Ordered 2, one worked perfect, the second had a problem with the screen. The lettering was all in blue not white. I could get no resolution from Amazon on fixing the problem or replacing the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Renae M Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for seniors
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mother-in-law. She’s 100 and needs help remembering what the day and date are. This clock is perfect. She calls it her computer clock!
customer_reviews.author: Rovereto living

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my father. The display is a nice bright white very easy to read. It's great that it spells out the day, and also whether it's day or night. It's also very easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: ToniV

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one 4 years ago for my dad (was 93) and he loved it kept him oriented etc..so now I bought the twin set one for my family, this stay at home stuff was making us wonder what day it was etc... perfect. The second one is for a bday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock for the office and everyone loves it. What I love most about this clock is that it not only shows you the month/day/year but the day of the week. An added feature is that is also displays the words: Morning, Afternoon, Evening. The set up was very easy. Out the box and plug it in. Didn't have to set the date, time, nothing. As for the price, I gave it 3 stars because I thought it was a bit high. If the price was in the range of $30 to $35 instead of $45, I would have bought more of them as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Regina B.

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful USEFUL aid for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Dad has shirt term memory loss...he keeps asking what day it is for example...I purchased two...one in our living room and other in his bedroom...he absolutely loves it!!! Frankly so do I as it is accurate with time and has the day as well as date, etc! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: U-G-L-Y  :(
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these clocks in "wood". The frames are CHEAP PLASTIC and are painted a weird salmon? Cherry? color. Just truly awful.
customer_reviews.author: TexCyn

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could dim it more...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. But I wish i can dim it more at night in the bedroom. Love that it has a backup battery for outages. Us it around the house for my 86yr old grandma who has learned to love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena H.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. I hope it lasts. It is a bit pricey but you do get two of them and the information that it gives out is especially good for an elderly person or someone that is forgetful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: The item works as described. The display is easy to read. It was easy to set up. Does have various options to modify the display to your needs/liking's. One of the 2 clocks went dark after a month. Contacted seller - the seller quickly sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for our office and one for a gift for my elderly mother. She loves it and we do too.
customer_reviews.author: Thara Little

customer_reviews.title: Great clock
